name: Happy Friends Museum
description:
"Happy Friends Museum" is the third game to use the Hondenkat Engine. Explore this virtual Animal Crossing museum as you get overly excited about the release of Animal Crossing: Happy Home Designer. Also bundled with the game are 10 brand new levels and a new tile type: THE HOLE.

Featuring a ton of new original artwork and properly licensed music, it's the experience Animal Crossing fans didn't know that they wanted! Maybe they still don't. You let me know. I'll be around.
